module.name: sirio
module.description: Sirio is an advanced monitoring system ideal for E-Commerce, with plans that can be adapted according to the number of visitors to the site. Sirio receives a large amount of data in real-time and analyzes customers' behavior within the website, tracing all the interactions to find any possible anomaly that it might encounter in the funnel.
module.author: Chiron
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to delete these details?
